body_html: Rohan/Priya: I'm guessing this is what happens when a tf.string tensor goes through prefetch_to_devices(), but unclear whether it should be handled in the client program (e.g. by splitting out strings from the prefetched dataset) or in the FunctionBufferingResource (e.g. by allowing some outputs to be "host memory" only).
body_text: Rohan/Priya: I'm guessing this is what happens when a tf.string tensor goes through prefetch_to_devices(), but unclear whether it should be handled in the client program (e.g. by splitting out strings from the prefetched dataset) or in the FunctionBufferingResource (e.g. by allowing some outputs to be "host memory" only).
body: Rohan/Priya: I'm guessing this is what happens when a `tf.string` tensor goes through `prefetch_to_devices()`, but unclear whether it should be handled in the client program (e.g. by splitting out strings from the prefetched dataset) or in the `FunctionBufferingResource` (e.g. by allowing some outputs to be "host memory" only).
